attributes.additional_details:
Stop taxing middle income families on every pound earnt over £35k at the same 40% rate as that earnt up to £150k by higher income families, as in todays Britain living on say £50k is a totally different situation to say £90k but the government does not acknowledge that with the current Income Tax Thresholds.
New Proposal:

Salary                       Income Tax
0- £40,000                    20%
£40,001 - £75,000         30%
£75,001 - £110,000        40%
£110,001 - 150,000        45%
£150,000+                     50%
